about_the_game:
Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: Wild Beasts, you will find 18 unique and expertly crafted pixel monsters for your game!

Nature can be both elegant and deadly. With a wide variety of monsters that can be found in various biomes, this pack is perfect to round out your roster of enemy battlers!

Features:

- 18 unique static battler sprites based on various wild beasts you may encounter in a fantasy setting!
- Pallet Swaps for increased bestiary value, which increases total monster count to 90!
- Charsets of the monsters are bundled, with walking animations for map view!
- Various convenient resizes (2x and 3x) to fit with different resolutions!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
